DOC.brief_summary: This study design evaluate lung function pain control continuous supraclavicular versus suprascapular versus interscalene nerve catheter subject undergoing total shoulder replacement . The investigator hypothesize three group would similar pain control ; supraclavicular suprascapular group may better lung function .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Pulmonary Function Efficacy Different Nerve Block Catheters Shoulder Surgery
DOC.criteria: Unilateral total shoulder arthroplasty ASA physical status IIII > 18 year old Nonpregnant ( lactate ) Consent participate study Refusal participate < 18 year old Chronic opioid use Localized infection Pregnancy lactate Preexisting coagulopathy Allergy ultrasound gel local anesthetic Diaphragmatic dysfunction
